backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, question management, full syllabus test creation/management, test attempts with section-based timing and scoring, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state (without test attempts) to new actor state by adding testAttempts, sectionStatuses maps, and nextTestAttemptId counter with score fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of test interface features including section state fetching, countdown timer, section submission, automatic section transitions, and result display.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files with their key functionality and features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color variables for Concept Delta's navy blue theme and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up QueryClient for React Query and RouterProvider with TanStack Router configuration and type declarations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding with delta symbol, quick links, YouTube channel link, Instagram handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer with flex layout for sticky footer behavior.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with responsive mobile menu, displaying logo, dashboard/admin links when authenticated, and login/logout buttons using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: React Query mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning questions to tests, with automatic cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, questions, user profiles, and test attempts from the backend actor.
React Query mutation hook for creating questions with text/image content, multiple choice options, correct answer, explanation, subject, and class level.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: React Query mutations for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt cache on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management. Displays placeholder statistics cards and requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests by selecting questions from two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths). Handles test creation and question assignment with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form page for creating questions with text/image support for both question and options, including subject/class selection, correct answer marking, and explanation. Validates that questions and options have content before submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showcasing Concept Delta MHT-CET mock test platform with hero section, YouTube subscription requirement, Telegram community link, and feature highlights. Includes authentication flow via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Placeholder leaderboard page that displays test ID and requires authentication. Currently shows a stub message indicating backend integration is pending.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Placeholder results page that displays result ID and requires authentication. Currently shows a stub message indicating backend integration is pending.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard displaying available active tests with start test functionality. Handles test attempt creation, section initialization, and navigation to test interface with attempt ID.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: React component for the timed test-taking interface with two 90-minute sections, handling question navigation, answer selection, timer countdown, auto-submit on timeout, and section transitions.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with routes for landing page, student/admin dashboards, question/test creation, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, documenting architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity), test types, scoring rules, branding (navy blue, delta symbol), and known issues.
